name: HaikuReader
0:
”Alexa, open Haiku Reader”
”Alexa, ask Haiku Reader to read me an ancient Japanese poem”
”Alexa, ask Haiku reader to read out a haiku”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: haiku reader
des:
This skill reads you a random haiku when asked. It's great for awkward silences or spooking visitors. It is also a good way of brightening up your day with a traditional Japanese poem. 

You simply need to ask the Haiku Reader skill for a poem/haiku, and there you have it!

For example, you could say "Alexa, ask Haiku Reader to tell me an ancient Japanese poem", to which she'll reply "I have a haiku for you..." 

Get ready for a surprise!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
